name: @techpotli/backend
description: TechPotli e-commerce platform backend with microservices architecture
author: TechPotli Team

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:services
scripts.build:shared: npm run build --workspace=@techpotli/common && npm run build --workspace=@techpotli/database
scripts.build:services: npm run build --workspace=@techpotli/user-service && npm run build --workspace=@techpotli/product-service && npm run build --workspace=@techpotli/cart-service && npm run build --workspace=@techpotli/order-service && npm run build --workspace=@techpotli/payment-service
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run start:dev:user" "npm run start:dev:product" "npm run start:dev:cart" "npm run start:dev:order" "npm run start:dev:payment"
scripts.docker:build: npm run docker:build:shared && npm run docker:build:services
scripts.docker:build:services: npm run docker:build:user && npm run docker:build:product && npm run docker:build:cart && npm run docker:build:order && npm run docker:build:payment
scripts.docker:push:services: npm run docker:push:user && npm run docker:push:product && npm run docker:push:cart && npm run docker:push:order && npm run docker:push:payment
scripts.k8s:deploy:services: npm run k8s:deploy:user && npm run k8s:deploy:product && npm run k8s:deploy:cart && npm run k8s:deploy:order && npm run k8s:deploy:payment
scripts.k8s:delete:services: npm run k8s:delete:user && npm run k8s:delete:product && npm run k8s:delete:cart && npm run k8s:delete:order && npm run k8s:delete:payment
scripts.health:check: npm run health:check:user && npm run health:check:product && npm run health:check:cart && npm run health:check:order && npm run health:check:payment
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:services
scripts.test:shared: npm run test --workspace=@techpotli/common && npm run test --workspace=@techpotli/database
scripts.test:services: npm run test:user && npm run test:product && npm run test:cart && npm run test:order && npm run test:payment
scripts.lint: npm run lint:shared && npm run lint:services
scripts.lint:shared: npm run lint --workspace=@techpotli/common && npm run lint --workspace=@techpotli/database
scripts.lint:services: npm run lint:user && npm run lint:product && npm run lint:cart && npm run lint:order && npm run lint:payment
scripts.format: npm run format:shared && npm run format:services
scripts.format:shared: npm run format --workspace=@techpotli/common && npm run format --workspace=@techpotli/database
scripts.format:services: npm run format:user && npm run format:product && npm run format:cart && npm run format:order && npm run format:payment
scripts.clean: npm run clean:shared && npm run clean:services
scripts.clean:shared: npm run clean --workspace=@techpotli/common && npm run clean --workspace=@techpotli/database
scripts.clean:services: npm run clean:user && npm run clean:product && npm run clean:cart && npm run clean:order && npm run clean:payment
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:shared && npm run install:services
scripts.install:services: npm install:user && npm install:product && npm install:cart && npm install:order && npm install:payment
